title: Chris Froome on Possible Tour de France Return: ‘It’s Still Too Early to Say’
content:
Froome is hoping a strong ride at the Criterium du Dauphiné could see him punch his ticket with Israel Premier Tech for the Tour, starting June 29 in Florence, Italy.

Read the full article at Chris Froome on Possible Tour de France Return: ‘It’s Still Too Early to Say’ on Velo.
author: ahood
